mapper.select: SELECT distinct r.name roleName, r.`code` roleCode, a.id, a.`name`, a.label, a.`code`, a.icon, a.url, a.parent_Code parentCode, a.component, a.type, a.status FROM system_role r, system_user_role ur, system_role_authorization ra, system_authorization a WHERE r.id=ur.role_id AND ur.role_id = ra.role_id AND ra.authorization_id = a.id AND ur.user_id = #{userId}
